sentence: How did the hulk feel after trying to lift mjolnir? he felt thor.
explanation: refers to feeling strong or powerful (like Thor from mythology) and also refers to sore when lifting something heavy.
first_new_sentence: After trying to lift the heavy weights, he felt thor from the effort he put in.
second_new_sentence: The pain in his muscles made him feel thor after the intense workout.

sentence: What do waiters want most after dinner? the tip!
explanation: refers to a gratuity given to service workers and to the action of giving a hint or advice.
first_new_sentence: He left a generous tip for the waiter as a token of appreciation.
second_new_sentence: She gave him a tip about investing in stocks to help him save money.

sentence: Why couldnt the melons secretly get married? because they were cant elopes.
explanation: refers to being unable to or not able to and is also a play on words with cant (cannot)
first_new_sentence: The changes in the weather meant he cant go to the beach this weekend.
second_new_sentence: Despite having the desire to attend the concert, he cant seem to get tickets.
